DOC.brief_summary: The researchers aimed to investigate that preoperative anxiety scores of patients who are informed about the anesthesia before surgery with using State-Trait Anxiety Inventory and Amsterdam preoperative anxiety and information scale tests together.
DOC.brief_title: Regional Anesthesia / Peripheral Nerve Block and General Anesthesia on Preoperative Anxiety
DOC.detailed_description: Patients will be informed about the anesthesia procedure in service ad then It will be held anxiety questionnaires one day before surgery and operation rooms.
DOC.criteria: Aged between 18 and 80, both women and men, Patients will be operated psychiatric and neurologic diseases, hearing and speech disorders, Psychiatric drug and chronic alcohol use
